statements: SELECT * FROM CocktailPopularity WHERE popularity_score > 8.0;
SELECT cocktail_name, popularity_score FROM CocktailPopularity WHERE date_recorded = '2022-09-01';
SELECT cocktail_name, popularity_score FROM CocktailPopularity ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT cocktail_name, popularity_score FROM CocktailPopularity WHERE cocktail_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT cocktail_name, popularity_score FROM CocktailPopularity WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30';
SELECT * FROM CocktailPopularity WHERE popularity_score > 8 ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT cocktail_name, popularity_score FROM CocktailPopularity WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT cocktail_id, cocktail_name FROM CocktailPopularity ORDER BY cocktail_name ASC;
SELECT cocktail_name, popularity_score FROM CocktailPopularity WHERE popularity_score >= 5 AND DATE_FORMAT(date_recorded, '%Y-%m') = '2021-07';
SELECT AVG(popularity_score) AS avg_popularity FROM CocktailPopularity WHERE popularity_score < 7 GROUP BY cocktail_name ORDER BY avg_popularity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM cocktails WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, popularity_score FROM cocktails ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM cocktails WHERE popularity_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM cocktails WHERE name LIKE 'Margarita%';
SELECT * FROM cocktail_popularity WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT name, popularity_score FROM cocktails WHERE popularity_score > 0.5 ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM cocktails WHERE name LIKE 'M%' AND popularity_score < 0.7;

SELECT name, popularity_score, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS popularity_date FROM cocktails JOIN cocktail_popularity ON cocktails.id = cocktail_popularity.cocktail_id WHERE popularity_rank <= 10 ORDER BY popularity_rank ASC;

SELECT cocktails.name, AVG(cocktail_popularity.popularity_rank) AS avg_rank FROM cocktails JOIN cocktail_popularity ON cocktails.id = cocktail_popularity.cocktail_id GROUP BY cocktails.id HAVING AVG(cocktail_popularity.popularity_rank) > 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cocktails, MAX(popularity_score) AS highest_popularity_score FROM cocktails;
SELECT drink_name, popularity_score FROM cocktails;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE category = 'Spirits';
SELECT drink_name, popularity_score FROM cocktails ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT drink_name, created_at FROM cocktails WHERE popularity_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM cocktail_logs ORDER BY logged_at DESC;
SELECT drink_name, popularity_score FROM cocktails ORDER BY popularity_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE category = 'Alcohol';
SELECT drink_name, COUNT(log_id) AS log_count FROM cocktails c LEFT JOIN cocktail_logs l ON c.drink_id = l.drink_id GROUP BY drink_name ORDER BY log_count DESC;
SELECT i.ingredient_name, c.drink_name FROM ingredients i INNER JOIN cocktails c ON i.ingredient_id = c.drink_id;
SELECT MAX(popularity_score) AS max_popularity, MIN(popularity_score) AS min_popularity FROM cocktails;
SELECT * FROM cocktails;
SELECT cocktail_name, popularity_rating FROM cocktails ORDER BY popularity_rating DESC;

SELECT cocktail_name, ingredient_name FROM cocktails JOIN cocktail_ingredients ON cocktails.cocktail_id = cocktail_ingredients.cocktail_id JOIN ingredients ON ingredients.ingredient_id = cocktail_ingredients.ingredient_id;
SELECT cocktail_name, popularity_rating, created_date FROM cocktails WHERE popularity_rating > 50;
SELECT cocktail_name, popularity_rating, event_date FROM cocktails JOIN cocktail_history ON cocktails.cocktail_id = cocktail_history.cocktail_id;
SELECT * FROM cocktails;
SELECT cocktail_name, popularity_rating FROM cocktails ORDER BY popularity_rating DESC;
SELECT cocktail_name, ingredient_name FROM cocktails c JOIN cocktail_ingredients ci ON c.cocktail_id = ci.cocktail_id JOIN ingredients i ON ci.ingredient_id = i.ingredient_id;

SELECT c.cocktail_name, ci.ingredient_id, i.ingredient_name FROM cocktails c JOIN cocktail_ingredients ci ON c.cocktail_id = ci.cocktail_id JOIN ingredients i ON ci.ingredient_id = i.ingredient_id WHERE c.popularity_rating > 50;
SELECT c.cocktail_name, ch.popularity_rating, ch.event_date FROM cocktails c LEFT JOIN cocktail_history ch ON c.cocktail_id = ch.cocktail_id;
SELECT * FROM cocktails
SELECT id, name, popularity FROM cocktails ORDER BY popularity DESC
SELECT name, category FROM ingredients WHERE category = 'Syrup'
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE quantity LIKE '%oz'
SELECT comment, reviewer_name FROM reviews WHERE rating >= 4
SELECT * FROM cocktails WHERE popularity > 50 ORDER BY popularity DESC
SELECT c.name, r.rating, r.comment FROM cocktails c LEFT JOIN reviews r ON c.id = r.cocktail_id WHERE r.rating >= 4
SELECT c.name AS cocktail_name, i.name AS ingredient_name FROM cocktails c INNER JOIN recipes ON c.id = recipes.cocktail_id INNER JOIN ingredients i ON recipes.ingredient_id = i.id
SELECT c.name, COUNT(r.id) AS num_reviews FROM cocktails c LEFT JOIN reviews r ON c.id = r.cocktail_id GROUP BY c.name ORDER BY num_reviews DESC
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC
